title: FTP Misconfiguration Vault
description: A straightforward challenge that highlights the risks of misconfigured FTP servers, focusing on anonymous access and file exposure.
hints: Try to connect using anonymous FTP.
Look for files that are not typically exposed.
Explore the directory structure for any sensitive files.
learningObjectives: Understand the security risks of FTP server misconfigurations.
Learn how to identify and exploit anonymous FTP access.
Gain experience in retrieving files from an FTP server.
